{{adaptation}}
The '''Stout-axes''' or the '''Khirvísa''' are a part of Drása's Folk, a House of the [[Dwarves]] created for [[The Lord of the Rings Online]] game by [[Standing Stone Games]].

When they were lured into [[Mordor]] by their desire for their [[Ring of Power]], they were eventually enslaved and lost to history. During the War of the Ring, they were under the command of the [[Black Númenórean]] Zôreth. Their king Váskmun Greytooth was brought to [[Barad-dûr]], where he was forced to wear Manthríf until he could no longer endure it.  After the defeat of [[Sauron]] they called themselves the '''Firehorns''' and, according to the game, they became free and many joined in the various endeavors of the other [[Free peoples|Free Peoples of Middle-earth]].
